fields.Name: Rite of Ruin
fields.Description: +100 Ability Power +100% Base Mana Regen +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Razing: Gain charges upon moving or killing enemies (200 charges max). Attacking a structure expends 50 charges to deal 100 (+15% AP) bonus true damage. ''When all their works have crumbled, their hearts will be laid bare.''
